Through lineage, magic, or wishes made real, the blood of a noble genie flows through your veins.

Spell List arcane

Bloodline Skills Arcana, Deception

Granted Spells cantrip: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic}; 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Disguise]{Illusory Disguise}; 2nd: variable (see Genie Type below); 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enthrall]{Enthrall}; 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Creation]{Creation}; 5th: variable (see Genie Type below); 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Seeing]{True Seeing}; 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Energy Aegis]{Energy Aegis}; 8th: variable (see Genie Type below); 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resplendent Mansion]{Resplendent Mansion}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Genie's Veil]{Genie's Veil}; advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Heart's Desire]{Heart's Desire}; greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wish-Twisted Form]{Wish-Twisted Form}

Blood Magic Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Genie Type

At 1st level, choose the type of genie that influenced your bloodline: janni, djinni, efreeti, marid, or shaitan. You can't change your genie type later. This determines what granted spells you receive at 2nd, 5th, and 8th level.

• Janni 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Create Food]{Create Food}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Banishment]{Banishment}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Scintillating Pattern]{Scintillating Pattern}

• Djinni 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Invisibility]{Invisibility}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Scene]{Illusory Scene}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Punishing Winds]{Punishing Winds}

• Efreeti 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Elemental Form]{Elemental Form} (fire only); 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Maze]{Maze}

• Marid 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Water Walk]{Water Walk}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Control Water]{Control Water}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Horrid Wilting]{Horrid Wilting}

• Shaitan 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Glitterdust]{Glitterdust}; 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wall of Stone]{Wall of Stone}; 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Earthquake]{Earthquake}
